Hi I'm Rachel Irabor

My name is Rachel Irabor. I am a software developer and a podcaster. I am passionate about creating software solutions that solve real-world problems. I am also passionate about sharing knowledge and inspiring others to pursue a career in tech. I am the host of the Tech Talk with Rachel podcast where I share insights on the tech industry, career advice, and interviews with tech professionals.
